relproducts.title: Oslo Blackout Indigo Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This dark indigo blue roller blind refreshes any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

relproducts.title: Stirlo Sloe Purple
relproducts.description: Stirlo sloe purpleplain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

relproducts.title: Splash Indigo Blue Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue, almost navy, roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring acorn pull which removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their splash indigo blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. relproducts.title: Ecowood Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The ecowood's chenille satin is discreet and demure in a matt, creamy white finish. This authentic-looking faux wood is formed from high quality, hardwearing pvc, making it both sturdy, wipe-clean, and water-resistant - and therefore ideal for any family-centred room. Offset a duck egg colour scheme in a contemporary kitchen, setting the chenille satin amidst painted walls and cream or wooden units.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Chenille Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: The creamy, off-white chenille fine grain, from the hardwearing ecowood range, is light and relaxed, ensuring that it will match a range of decor schemes. This durable, pvc blind is quick and simple to install, freeing up your time to sit and enjoy it. Enhance a daring, tropical purple feature wall in a teenager's bedroom by hanging the chenille fine grain against it, using glossy and glistening silvers as accents.

relproducts.title: Ecowood Deluxe Chenille Satin - Venetian Blind
relproducts.description: Blend style and class with durable usability with the ecowood deluxe in chenille satin, a designer-style, wooden venetian blind with a matt cream finish. This streamlined piece is backed with matching, vertical ladder tapes to hold and adjust the slats, giving further cohesion and coordination. Construct a modern design scheme in your home office, painting the walls in pale baby blue and matching the carpet to the soothing chenille satin.
